text: Joy Fleming, aka of Erna Liebenow, born as Erna Raad, (15 November 1944 in Rockenhausen - 27 September 2017 in Sinsheim-Hilsbach) was a German singer of jazz, blues and schlager. == Career == Fleming was best known for her performance in the Eurovision Song Contest in 1975. She performed the song "Ein Lied kann eine Br√ºcke sein" and was placed seventeenth out of nineteen countries. Joy Fleming died at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:People from Rhineland-Palatinate
title: Joy Fleming
